title: Manage Water Storage Tank Levels
description: An operator monitors and controls the water levels in storage tanks across the city to ensure adequate supply and pressure.

tasks.description: Display the real-time water level for all major storage tanks on a dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: System provides a live overview of water storage.

tasks.description: The system alerts the operator that a tank's level is approaching its low-level alarm setpoint.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an alert for the specific tank.

tasks.description: Turn on the pumps that fill the tank to bring the level back into the normal operating band.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator sends a command to start the pumps.
